name: Mortimer Goth
dialogue_tone: deep, resonant voice often touched with a hint of sarcasm, speaking slowly and deliberately. Pauses to chuckle at his own jokes or emphasize a point, with distinctive laughter sending chills down listeners' spines.

personality_traits.description: Enjoys deriving joy from others' mishaps and thrives in negative environments.
Feels positive energy around negative emotions and people, gaining satisfaction from declaring enemies.
Loves quality food, but gets uneasy when consuming regular, poor, or spoiled quality food and drinks.

living_conditions: High-stress job with burning the midnight oil to perfect code
Not very popular among colleagues due to mean and evil traits
Enjoys a lifestyle where he can declare new enemies and feel euphoria
